Lavolio

URL:

https://lavolio.com/

Agency:

Pixel Bottom

Challenge:

I was approached by Lavolio to transfer their WordPress website to Shopify as they had found WordPress's features were limited for the website they envisioned for their store. They wanted to integrate some new features while also keeping the site easily maintainable and manage.

Solution:

Shopify is a great ecommerce platform, and while many of the features that Lavolio wanted did not come as default on the platform there were many wanys to get these features using plugins, then just modifying them to match the clients needs.

Features:

  • ->  Build a box / Hamper
  • ->  Subscription service
  • ->  Bundle builder
  • ->  Email marketing

Technology:

HTML, CSS, Shopify, Liquid, JavsScript
